description: A surprisingly straightforward and effective song recognition app. The only thing that would make this program even better is a way to directly save the album covers as a .jpg or .png file. Of course, I can screen capture it but it's an extra step that a bit clunky. It would be great to see it incorporated into the app itself. The search exporting feature is probably not something I'd use that much but it's nice that it's there anyway.
Works really well, but I really would like the app to search only when I ask it to do so.

Works really well, but I really would like the app to search only when I ask it to do so. Every time I start up my computer, the app is up and running and automatically searches for anything it hears, so I have to mute it every single time. I don't want that. When I hear a song I like, I will ask the app to serach.

I have the app set to autostart with my Plasma desktop, would be really nice to have an autostart option in settings here and a setting to have this start minimized to tray. Also tray icon functionality to search and possibly do other things. Maybe keyboard shortcuts to search, open in YouTube or Google, .....
summary: Very nice, but needs some changes

description: When I first used this, it worked fine. It did occasionally misidentify songs, but it worked. Last time I used it, however, it would just duplicate itself and give me errors whenever I tried to close it. I ended up having to restart my computer.
works great, can't say anything more
works to identify music on my Pinephone!
